ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
ygData.msgSnippet: Was wondering about the shaman :P Yeah shaman are in a similar role after level 50ish.. almost always defensive yet for the life of me you can t get some
ygData.messageBody:
Was wondering about the shaman :P
Yeah shaman are in a similar role after level 50ish.. almost always
defensive
yet for the life of me you can't get some shaman to stop dotting and
meleeing
its insane cuz the non-efficient dot takes 7 ticks and the efficient one 2
mins.. in full groups they are such a waste of mana its unbelievable...

anyway, yeah yeah if i am such a good shaman how come i keep dying :(

> -----Original Message-----
> From: Mike Roach [mailto:Mike.Roach@...]
> Sent: Thursday, June 29, 2000 9:27 AM
> To: 'eqbards@egroups.com'
> Subject: RE: [eqbards] grouping thread on the Everquest boards
